name: ROMANTIC Roll On PERFUME With Organic Shea and Coconut Butter/ Vegan / 14Ml
description:
Smell lovely everywhere you go With our festive and fun fragrance that begins with fresh citrus top notes of grapefruit, orange zests, and tangerine; middle notes of strawberries, apples, pears, rose petals and jasmine; with sexy bottom notes of vetiver, white musk, and ylang ylang.
We call it Romantic because it will made you believe that you are slowly running in a pretty field with flowers and fruits:)

Our amazing perfume oil are pure goodness higly concentred in a cute little roll on glass bottle, perfect to carry in your purse!


What`s inside?
-Pure organic coconut oil a super light, non-staining oil that absorbs quickly into the skin so it will not leave you with a non pleasant greasy feeling!
-A hint of organic shea butter for smooth hydratation.
-Vitamine e oil as natural preservative.

How to use?
Simply roll a bit on your pulses points or wherever you feel like smelling yummylicious :)


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fully pack in a 14 ml Glass roll-on bottle.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Parabens, sls and PHTHALATE FREE! 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
As no harsh preservatives is use inside, we recommend to use it within 1-3 months!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
For more freshness, Almost all of our products are made to order, so please allow 24 to 48 hours for shipping.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
We love animals so much that we do not eat them, and certainly do not put any animals products in our body treats!
This product is 100% Vegan and cruelty free!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dont hesitate to contact me if you have any questions and or comments!
Thank you for looking, 
Have a wonderful day :)

name: ORANGE CREAMSICLE Vegan lip balm / With Organic Shea butter / For smooth kissable Lips
description:
For amazingly smooth, kissable and healthy lips all year long with this wonderful yummy (natural) Lip balm !

Made from scratch (no base has been use here!) 
100% VEGAN, beeswax free!

For extra hydratation we use:
• Organic Coconut butter
• Organic Shea butter
• Grapeseed oils
• Sweet almond oils

*** Will not leave you with unwanted residues or too much oily feeling! ***

This listing is for: ORANGE CREAMSICLE: Sweet, Lollipopish, just like the real thing flavor!

***FREE SHIPPING WITH ANOTHER ITEM OF OUR SHOP***

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Did you know?
shea butter will naturally protect your lips from sunburn!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fully pack in a .20 oz Recyclabe plastic container.

name: STRAWBERRIES and CREAM / VEGAN glycerine soap / With organic shea and coconut butter
description:
Wash the dirt away with a super sweet aroma of fresh strawberries with just a hint of creamy vanilla. 
Add organic shea and coconut butter for extra smoothness and hydratation.

And voila! 
You have our amazing vegan glycerine soap!

His wonderful scent and maximum moisturizing will leave your skin silky smooth and amazingly yummy smelling :)

Perfect for everyday shower!

*Please note that color may be slightly different in real!

Each bar weight approx 5oz
Come individually wrap in shrink wrap paper for ore cleanliness and freshness.
